name: Knowles Corporation
description: Knowles Corporation is a global leader in advanced micro-acoustic microphones and audio processing technologies, specializing in providing innovative solutions for a variety of applications, including consumer electronics, telecommunications, and automotive sectors. Founded in 1946 and headquartered in Itasca, Illinois, Knowles has established itself as a pioneer in the audio industry, particularly in the development of MEMS (Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems) microphones that deliver superior sound quality and performance. The company’s products are widely used in smartphones, wearables, smart home devices, and hearing aids, enhancing audio experiences for users worldwide. Knowles is committed to continuous innovation and invests heavily in research and development to stay at the forefront of audio technology. The company also offers a range of complementary products, such as audio processing solutions and speaker technologies, aiming to provide customers with comprehensive audio solutions for diverse applications. With a strong focus on quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction, Knowles Corporation strives to create a world where every sound is captured and transmitted with clarity, enhancing communication and entertainment experiences for consumers.
